
---
title: '2499~3999 元，OPPO Reno8 _ Pro _ Pro+ 系列正式发布：首发骁龙 7，搭载自研 NPU'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 热榜
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/a9266162-b746-4c32-87e3-7fa521c4366f.jpg@s_2,w_820,h_856'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Mon, 23 May 2022 12:43:29 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/a9266162-b746-4c32-87e3-7fa521c4366f.jpg@s_2,w_820,h_856'
---

<div>   
<p data-vmark="3560"><a class="s_tag" href="https://www.ithome.com/" target="_blank">IT之家</a> 5 月 23 日消息，OPPO Reno8 系列今日晚间正式发布，全球首发骁龙 7 处理器，售价 2499 元起。</p><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="7ec1"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/a9266162-b746-4c32-87e3-7fa521c4366f.jpg@s_2,w_820,h_856" w="1080" h="1128" title="2499~3999 元，OPPO Reno8 / Pro / Pro+ 系列正式发布：首发骁龙 7，搭载自研 NPU" srcset="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/a9266162-b746-4c32-87e3-7fa521c4366f.jpg 2x" width="1080" height="856" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><h2 data-vmark="c160">OPPO Reno8 Pro+</h2><p data-vmark="7fbf">OPPO Reno8 Pro+ 拥有逍遥青、漫游灰、暗涌黑三款配色，厚 7.34mm，重 183g，采用航空铝金属中框。</p><p data-vmark="3f21">OPPO Reno8 Pro+ 搭载联发科<span class="accentTextColor">天玑 8100-MAX 处理器</span>，LPDDR5 内存 + UFS 3.1 闪存，配有马里亚纳 MariSilicon X 自研 NPU，超晶石墨散热系统，拥有 4500mAh 电池，支持 80W 闪充。</p><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="d992"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/2b8586d9-05cf-4d69-a92d-5a26256aebfb.png" w="1321" h="782" title="2499~3999 元，OPPO Reno8 / Pro / Pro+ 系列正式发布：首发骁龙 7，搭载自研 NPU" width="1321" height="485" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="e106">该机搭载 6.67 英寸 2400x1080 OLED 柔性直屏，支持 120Hz 刷新率、10.7 亿色。</p><p data-vmark="a957">影像方面，该机前置 32MP 索尼 IMX709 挖孔镜头，后置 50MP 索尼 IMX766 OIS 主摄，以及 8MP 索尼 IMX355 超广角 + 2MP 豪威 OV02B10 镜头。</p><p data-vmark="69ef">此外，该机配备 X 轴线性马达、立体声双扬声器，支持 NFC，配备 200ms 超薄光学指纹。</p><p data-vmark="815d">OPPO Reno8 Pro+ 的售价为：</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p data-vmark="0aae">8GB+256GB 3699 元</p></li><li><p data-vmark="df3d">12GB+256GB 3999 元</p></li></ul><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="1ec4"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/74326daa-7e35-455b-8328-63daa033883d.jpg@s_2,w_820,h_495" w="1440" h="869" title="2499~3999 元，OPPO Reno8 / Pro / Pro+ 系列正式发布：首发骁龙 7，搭载自研 NPU" srcset="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/74326daa-7e35-455b-8328-63daa033883d.jpg 2x" width="1440" height="495" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAOcJK1olXwcBVF1bD0oTB18IGloUXw4CUlxdDkgnRzBQRQQlBENHFRxWFlVPRjtUBABAQlRcCEBdCUoWAWcIHVkVWwUdDRsBVXsfZT9ab1lGOWRwKio_Cw8fZC11Tg91UQoyUV9UAEISAm4MK1gXWgQEUFteD3t0ZAFVWl9eAV56Am5dDXtVbWoAG1sTXwUCSF5bAEISAmwLK1sWWgIAUVZcAEMnA2gMGVkUVQIKXF9UD3sXC2g4RxlHHEQyZG5eOHsnA18LKwV7XFUCVFtVAUh5Xm1QWh9OWENsVlheAU4UM20JGlkXbTY" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAOYJK1olXwcBVF1bD0oTB18IGloUXw4CUlxdDkgnRzBQRQQlBENHFRxWFlVPRjtUBABAQlRcCEBdCUoWAWcIHVkVWwUdDRsBVXtTc2ZKfxIQGmV-Ii0eDCBBe2Z7Eyh1UQoyUV9ZCU4nAG0PGV0RWAUFZD06ZhZWByRUQyNDbQQDUV9cAHtVbWoAG1sTXwUCSF5bAEISAmwLK1gUXwYDVV9YAUwnA2gMGVkUVQIKXF1fDXsXC2g4RxlHHEQyZG5eOHsnA18LKwV7XFUCV19aDR95Xm1QWh9OVE9sU1ZbDEInAW4JGVklbQ" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-hosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=%2fpages%2funion%2fproxy%2fproxy%3fspreadUrl%3dhttps%253a%252f%252funion-click.jd.com%252fjdc%253fe%253d%2526p%253dJF8BAOcJK1olXwcBVF1bD0oTB18IGloUXw4CUlxdDkgnRzBQRQQlBENHFRxWFlVPRjtUBABAQlRcCEBdCUoWAWcIHVkVWwUdDRsBVXtICxJ_YglpP2VpAAAWbxJeVSh0YSN1UQoyVFxdAEgWA24LE2sWXwEAUlpYC0wnYAhmRhoRFlpaLAhtCEonQQENE1sVWwQBVEJdDkMeBm4LGGsVXgcAUl5aCEMfM28PH1kXXA4GXFZZCU8nA2cPKwdXD0dAZG5tC3snM284GGtLMwdRVF4IDkoSbTIKQxpRBlBDOllVDE8TM20JGlkXbTY%26EA_PTAG%3d17078.27.380" data-jdid="100039173172"><span class="card main-site"><span class="card-logo"><img src="https://img14.360buyimg.com/pop/jfs/t1/42135/5/18098/122773/628284b6E23def857/e85a66a470cf621d.jpg" title="2499~3999 元，OPPO Reno8 / Pro / Pro+ 系列正式发布：首发骁龙 7，搭载自研 NPU" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></span><span class="card-info"><span class="card-title"><span class="mall-data">京东</span><span class="card-name"> OPPO Reno8 Pro+ 12GB+256GB 逍遥青</span></span><span class="card-abstract"></span><span class="card-controls"><span class="price"> 3949 元</span><span class="card-btn-deep">直达链接</span></span></span></span></a></dir><h2 data-vmark="a830">OPPO Reno8 Pro</h2><p data-vmark="de3d">OPPO Reno8 Pro 拥有微醺、邂逅蓝、夜游黑三款配色，厚 7.57mm，重 188g，采用航空铝金属中框。</p><p data-vmark="71b0"><span class="accentTextColor">该机首发骁龙 7 处理器</span>，LPDDR4X 内存 + UFS 2.1 闪存，配备马里亚纳 MariSilicon X 自研 NPU，3D 恒冷中央散热系统，拥有 4500mAh 电池，支持 80W 闪充。</p><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="24c5"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/04aae668-84ed-4838-9af3-f21f7aa22ae9.png" w="1332" h="759" title="2499~3999 元，OPPO Reno8 / Pro / Pro+ 系列正式发布：首发骁龙 7，搭载自研 NPU" width="1332" height="467" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="b4ee">该机搭载 6.62 英寸 2400x1080 OLED 直屏，三星 E4 发光材料，峰值亮度达 1300nits，支持 120Hz 刷新率。</p><p data-vmark="2bf8">影像方面，该机前置 32MP 索尼 IMX709 镜头，后置 50MP 索尼 IMX766 OIS 主摄，以及 8MP 超广角 + 2MP 微距镜头。</p><p data-vmark="c4b8">此外，该机配备 X 轴线性马达、单扬声器，支持 NFC。</p><p data-vmark="799b">OPPO Reno8 Pro 的售价为：</p><ul class="ai-word-checked list-paddingleft-2"><li><p data-vmark="5e90">8GB+128GB 2999 元</p></li><li><p data-vmark="e41d">8GB+256GB 3199 元</p></li><li><p data-vmark="5aaf">12GB+256GB 3499 元</p></li></ul><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="f97b"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/08f08e11-a1fb-4b9d-b90e-3acccd750257.jpg@s_2,w_820,h_495" w="1440" h="869" title="2499~3999 元，OPPO Reno8 / Pro / Pro+ 系列正式发布：首发骁龙 7，搭载自研 NPU" srcset="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/08f08e11-a1fb-4b9d-b90e-3acccd750257.jpg 2x" width="1440" height="495" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=%2fpages%2funion%2fproxy%2fproxy%3fspreadUrl%3dhttps%253a%252f%252funion-click.jd.com%252fjdc%253fe%253d%2526p%%26EA_PTAG%3d17078.27.380" data-jdid="100022841549"><span class="card main-site"><span class="card-logo"><img src="https://img14.360buyimg.com/pop/jfs/t1/113423/9/25053/124213/62827daeEd635bb5f/c6a1772bc330ebf8.jpg" class="card-name"> OPPO Reno8 Pro 12GB+256GB 微醺</span></span><span class="card-abstract"></span><span class="card-controls"><span class="price"> 3499 元</span><span class="card-btn-deep">直达链接</span></span></span></span></a></dir><h2 data-vmark="dff1">OPPO Reno8</h2><p data-vmark="ac33">OPPO Reno8 有微醺、晴空蓝、夜游黑三款配色，厚 7.67mm，重 179g。</p><p data-vmark="12d4">该机搭载<span class="accentTextColor">天玑 1300</span> 处理器，配备 6.43 英寸 2400x1080 OLED 屏，支持 90Hz 刷新率，拥有 4500mAh 电池，支持 80W 快充。</p><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="8033"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/a9e94502-e953-4a2e-b8a7-872d0a119306.png" w="1309" h="765" title="2499~3999 元，OPPO Reno8 / Pro / Pro+ 系列正式发布：首发骁龙 7，搭载自研 NPU" width="1309" height="479" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="dca7">影像方面，该机前置 32MP 索尼 IMX709 镜头，后置 50MP 三摄。此外，该机支持 Z 轴线性马达、NFC。</p><p data-vmark="a9cf">OPPO Reno8 的售价为：</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p data-vmark="348c">8GB+128GB 2499 元</p></li><li><p data-vmark="52ae">8GB+256GB 2699 元</p></li><li><p data-vmark="4614">12GB+256GB 2999 元</p></li></ul><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="1a60"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/1138dc7c-aab3-4f52-9cfb-59266fc31f60.jpg@s_2,w_820,h_495" w="1440" h="869" title="2499~3999 元，OPPO Reno8 / Pro / Pro+ 系列正式发布：首发骁龙 7，搭载自研 NPU" srcset="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/1138dc7c-aab3-4f52-9cfb-59266fc31f60.jpg 2x" width="1440" height="495" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><dir><a
